name: Winter (itch) (Ar🖤💎)
description:
A very short visual novel that I created in just a couple of days for the Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022. 

It's a very straightforward and basic experience about taking care of yourself during the winter season.

It's also my first completed Ren'Py game so I'm still learning about customisation and how the engine works.  

Hopefully, for a first (and very quick) effort, it's not too bad!
